structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(U). BIRD ROAD CORRIDOR URBAN AREA DISTRICT (BRCUAD)

law.catch_line: Bird Road Corridor Urban Area District (BRCUAD) Requirements.

text.section: Except as provided herein, all developments within the BRCUAD shall comply with the requirements provided in Article XXXIII(K), Standard Urban Center District Regulations, of this chapter.
